---

<h3 align="center">EzSnap</h3>

<p align="center">A Clean and Fast Snapchat Account Generator</p>

---

> If you like my projects, please consider leaving a :star: at the top right of the repository :)

# Features
- Insane speed
- MultiThreaded
- Built-In Recaptcha Bypass
- Proxy Support (HTTP, SOCKS4, SOCKS5)
- Easy Setup / Clean and Noob-Friendly UI

## Previews
[Video](https://youtu.be/_IAIUVQKl6I)

## FAQ
- **Q: How to use EzSnap?**
- A: You must first download the requirements with the command `pip install -r requirements.txt` and then follow the instructions after starting EzSnap with the command `python main.py`. You can also run the downloadable executable directly from the [Releases](https://github.com/TurfuFrogy/EzSnap/releases).
